thread.title: Spotted: You'll never guess who joined Man United ace Bastian Schweinsteiger for lunch
thread.title_full: Spotted: You'll never guess who joined Man United ace Bastian Schweinsteiger for lunch

title: Spotted: You'll never guess who joined Man United ace Bastian Schweinsteiger for lunch
text:
Premier League Championship Scottish Premiership Spotted: You'll never guess who joined Man United ace Bastian Schweinsteiger for lunch BASTIAN SCHWEINSTEIGER and Ana Ivanovic were spotted reuniting with an unlikely pair of old friends while out for lunch in Hale on Monday. PUBLISHED: 09:25, Tue, Feb 21, 2017 | UPDATED: 10:15, Tue, Feb 21, 2017 Bastian Schweinsteiger meets up with old team-mates for lunch date Tue, February 21, 2017 Bastian Schweinsteiger and Ana Ivanovic were spotted enjoying a lunch date with two of the German international's former team-mates on Monday 1 of 8 Bastian Schweinsteiger and Ana Ivanovic were spotted out and about in Hale 
The 32-year-old German international has worked his way back into the first-team squad at Old Trafford, and was an unused substitute during Manchester United's 2-1 win over Blackburn Rovers on Sunday. 
Schweinsteiger looked delighted as he caught up with a couple of former team-mates, while his wife Ivanovic may soon give the midfielder more reason to cheer if these pictures are anything to go by... 
Scroll through the gallery above to see the best snaps as Schweinsteiger and Ivanovic catch up with some old friends while out for lunch. Related articles
